description:
More lectures are in development.

Join over 600 Students in taking the Red Pill
__________________________________________________________________________

"This is Very Unique and Engaging Psychology Course. The video and production quality is excellent which makes it easy to watch and get into. It's different than anything else I've seen on udemy so far." - Peter Galaxy
__________________________________________________________________________

Learn how to open your mind and see how deep the rabbit hole goes.

In this course, I'll take you around the world as we explore the depths of human psychology.

Most people live their lives on autopilot, never giving much thought to the world around them with any level of depth. The bulk of the population hasn't taken the time to truly explore their mind.

This course has one goal in mind - to make you think!

Each video takes a concept and digs deeper than what most see at surface level. Combining elements of storytelling and occasional comedic value, each video has a rather episodic feel -- not necessarily depending on each other, but rather complimenting each other.

Along the way, you'll be greeted with lots of beautiful scenery that will leave your mind in awe.

What you'll get:

  • Carefully crafted, high production value content
  • A flood of deep thoughts showing you how to think differently
  • Tons of visual stimulation to help keep you engaged
  • A better perception of the world around you.

(Additional lectures are currently in the creation process.)

You can continue living your life day-to-day like you currently do, and nothing will change.

If you want to experience the world from a different perspective, you're invited to take this journey across cities & mountains to explore your mind.

All you have to do is take the red pill by signing up for this course. Stay the same or open your mind -- the choice is yours.
title: Psychology of the Red Pill:  Decoding Your Mental Matrix
